title: Variety System

criteria.text: Same seed produces identical output every time
Different seeds produce visually different variations
criteria.notes: test_generate_variety_different_seeds_differ confirms different seeds produce different output

criteria.text: All variety parameters are respected in generation
criteria.notes: test_generate_variety_respects_ranges checks all 200 seeds stay within param bounds

checklist.item: Create VarietyParams struct with seed and parameters
Ensure same seed always produces identical output
Ensure different seeds produce different variations

worker_notes: Implemented complete variety system in variety.rs with all spec requirements: VarietyParams (10 fields, Default, Serialize/Deserialize), VarietyInstance (with noise_seed), SimpleRng (xorshift32), seed_from_position (FNV-1a, 3 args), generate_variety, apply_color_variety (HSV manipulation), variety_to_transform (Mat4 via Quat), and 4 preset profiles (Tree, Grass, Rock, Structure). All 20 tests pass, cargo check passes.

iteration_history.action: Implemented full variety system per spec. Added Default impl, variety_to_transform(), 3-arg seed_from_position with FNV-1a, noise_seed field, and updated preset values to match spec exactly. All 20 tests pass, cargo check passes.

learnings: variety.rs already partially existed from a prior partial implementation, needed updates to match spec fully
mod.rs already had pub mod variety declared, and regenerate_extrude_mesh was already implemented
